actions.description: Send an email from the Gmail account that this connection is authorized to access.

propertyDefinitionSteps.description: Specify email content and addresses to send the email to.
propertyDefinitionSteps.name: Send Email through Gmail

bcc.label: producer
bcc.labelHint: One or more comma-separated email addresses to send a blind copy of the email to.

cc.label: producer
cc.labelHint: One or more comma-separated email addresses to send a copy of the email to.

subject.label: producer
subject.labelHint: The text to insert in the subject line of the email.

text.label: producer
text.labelHint: The email message that you want to send.

to.label: producer
to.labelHint: One or more comma-separated email addresses to send the email to.

actions.name: Send Email

actions.description: Obtain email from the Gmail account that this connection is authorized to access.

propertyDefinitionSteps.description: Specify the emails that you want to obtain.
propertyDefinitionSteps.name: Obtain Email from Gmail

delay.label: consumer,scheduler
delay.labelHint: Time interval between polls for emails.

labels.label: producer
labels.labelHint: Comma separated list of labels that are used in the Gmail account that this connection accesses.

markAsRead.label: producer
markAsRead.labelHint: Indicate that returned emails have been read.

maxResults.label: producer
maxResults.labelHint: Maximum number of emails to return.

actions.name: Receive Email

accessToken.labelHint: String provided by Google that authorizes access to a Gmail account.

applicationName.labelHint: A name that you choose as the name of an OAuth 2.0 Gmail client. This name appears in the Google developers account list of OAuth clients.

clientId.labelHint: The client ID that Google provides when you register a client application.

clientSecret.labelHint: The client secret that Google provides when you register a client application.

refreshToken.labelHint: String provided by Google that enables retrieval of a new access token.

userId.labelHint: Gmail account name that is associated with this registration.

actions.description: Start an integration from a Webhook

contextPath.description: The Webhook token that will be set as final part of the URL

actions.name: Incoming Webhook

connector.name: Webhook
